entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
